questions.question: What is one way to save money on food expenses?
questions.explanation: Cooking at home instead of eating out is healthier for both your wallet and your body.

questions.question: What should you do with multiple streaming subscriptions to save money?
questions.explanation: Cutting down to one streaming service can save money on fixed expenses.

questions.question: According to the 50/30/20 rule, what percentage of your income should go towards savings and investments?
questions.explanation: 20% of your income should be used for ensuring your financial health through savings and investments.

questions.question: What is one suggested method for reducing entertainment costs with friends?
questions.explanation: Hosting potlucks or having friends over for movie nights can save money compared to going out.

questions.question: Why is it important to revisit your budget every month?

options.B: To adjust for new expenses and income sources.

questions.explanation: Revisiting your budget allows you to make adjustments for new expenses and income sources, ensuring it remains manageable.
